name: Three Nights At Dan's

story:

the guy named dan (known as dantheanimator573) has been making a lets play videos, after he uploaded the video, he got knock out and kidnapped by the unknow person, and the next day, he woke up with the half monster face, and he lose control and becomes evil, and he was decided to kill someone, and you must survive until 6 am, so good luck
